meanings.definition: The quality or state of being adverse or contrary.
meanings.sent1: The adverseness of the situation made it difficult to find a solution.
meanings.sent2: The team faced great adverseness during the challenging project.
meanings.sent3: Despite the adverseness of the weather, they managed to have a successful picnic.
meanings.sent4: The adverseness of the rocky terrain tested their hiking skills.
meanings.sent5: The adverseness of the teacher's strict rules made the students nervous.

meanings.definition: An adverse or unfavorable event or circumstance.
meanings.sent1: The sudden adverseness of the storm caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with financial adverseness can be stressful for many families.
meanings.sent3: The adverseness of losing his favorite toy upset the little boy.
meanings.sent4: The adverseness of failing the test weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The adverseness of the traffic made him late for the important meeting.
